tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr.Anitha, she is very humble and soft spoken. When comes to her treatment, it looks very structured and logical. My Wife, she had 3 back-back miscarriages in the past and when we consulted her, she has given us a hope by identifying the problem partially at least where in others were unable to find the same. There were series of tests she had performed during the investigation, was able to explain why she did all these tests that are to narrow down the issue. There were situations both myself and my wife were feeling very nervous and worried by thinking of past situations but she filled in confidence for both of us with her words. Our treatment is still on-going, and we are yet to see the results from her treatment. It's too early to judge her treatment but we are pleased with the experience that we had till today. On top of everything, we trust her and that is the most important drug of all as you need to put some trust when doctor is trying to diagnose your problem so it will boost her confidence aswell to focus *** *********** *********  As said, we believe in her and hoping she can do something this time if my wife conceives again.

Thank You, Anitha garu *** **** ********* ******** *** ********** I appreciate your special focus and interest on our case.

Many Thanks,
Bhargava Ponnuru
Mahalakshmi Swetha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
After consulting multiple gynec over 1.5 years and failing to get a clear direction on treatment course, we started visiting Dr. Anitha in 2017.
On 21st October we were blessed with a full term baby girl through IVF FET.

Our journey over past 4 years has been full of ups and downs which involved multiple pre and post pregnancy complications like PCOD, Ovarian Cyst, Short Cervix, 6 month abortion, Low fluid levels, Pre term contractions etc.
There were moments in 2018 where we almost gave up and were exploring surrogacy options but a Central revised law in this respect blocked this avenue too.
That being said, there was never a moment where Dr. Anitha lost hope in us and was our pillar of strength (apart from our parents) and beacon throughout with her structured and logical treatment plan.
Starting from medication to ovarian drilling to IUI and IVF (ET & 2 FET's) & embryo freezing - we always had clarity on course of treatment and immense trust on Dr. Anitha & team.
Not even once did we feel the need for a second opinion and Femiint was always equipped to handle all our complications in utmost professional and qualified manner.

We can never thank Dr. Anitha and her team enough for helping us with Anika's birth and she will always be her God Mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Anitha understands the patient and try to give solution accordingly. She can be your friend and a doctor both . I always get a very positive response from Dr Anitha and her team of other doctors and nurses. She  welcomes her patients with her big pleasant smile every single time, really feels comfortable asking any question related to my health and she explains all answers with patience. 
Waiting for positive result for my pregnancy I would recommend her to my family and friends .
Thank you Dr.Anitha!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went along with my wife to Dr. Anitha BR in the Whitefield Motherhood hospital for my wife's pregnancy check up. First of all the doctor is very silent and do not explain the issues in detail. You need to wait for long hours even after appointment. She will not explain you much on the ongoing check up. She is least bothered about the issues you are facing and she will tell everything is fine. According to her everything was fine and when we went there for the seven month pregnancy growth scan of the baby to Dr. Smitha, then she told that the baby's growth is not good and in Doppler scan it came out that there is a backward blood flow in placenta. It was an emergency case and she asked to visit Dr. Anitha BR. But even in the case of emergency, she delayed the visit for hours and was keep on asking nurses but they would go to doctor and tell me that you are the next person to be in, but it took hours ** *** *** **** **** *** ********* ****** *** **** ***** ** ******* *** *********** ***** ******** *** when I threatened them that give my reports I will visit another hospital, then she finally met us and considering emergency case as baby's heart kept on dropping,  they took my wife for emergency care to have cesarean and deliver a baby in seven months and that also after waiting for 5 hours finally they did cealsarean and my baby was taken out and with ventilation support, he was taken to their branch in Indira Nagar Motherhood hospital. In Whitefield Motherhood hospital, they said that the weight of the baby was 650 grams but in Indira Nagar branch. they said he is 800 grams and also the baby had infection and very low platelet count. My baby was there in neonatal ICU for seven days and finally he succumbed to the disease. I was speechless and the main concern was when the same doctor said in the six month pregnancy check up, that everything was fine, how come this happened. *** **** *** *** ****** ** *** *** **** ******** ********** ********** **** *** ******* ** * ****** They don't have any desire to serve the people. Every month we use to go 2-3 times to doctor and dozens of test, but still this happened to us *** *** ** ***** ********* ******** ** **** *** **** ***** ******* *** ********* **** **** *** ***** ** **** ****** ***** *** ** ****** ** ******** ** *** **** ** **** **** ***** *** ** ********** ***** *** **** ***** **** **** ***** *** ****** ** *** *********** ********** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I got spotting within a week after my periods got over for which i had visited the doctor. First we were asked to fill the form and to wait for 5-10minutes. Later a nurse checked my BP and weight and send me and my husband to her cabin. Her assistant was working on her computer and we were asked to wait until doctor comes. After some time her assistant started asking questions without even introducing herself. *** * **** **** *********** **** *** ********* **** *** ******* When the doctor came she didnt even wished and didn't even bothered to ask however she asked her assistant and after knowing she just did some checkup. Her way of communication was very rough/rude and not convincing at all. I believe as a doctor her words should do more wonders than her treatment. Although she said nothing to worry as its normal to have spotting during ovulation. But as a doctor she should be more professional in speaking. Talking in Hindi is good but there is always a way to communicate and pass the message. If a doctor sounds rude the patient will be more tensed and worried. She in my case didnt even bothered to ask or give more information. When we even said that we are planning to have our child and asked what measurements need to take since I am also Type 2 diabetic, her response was very cold. No much information she gave infact she didnt speak at all. Felt like she was too busy with her other patients and didn't bother to diagnose us. Even though the issue was normal but as a layman its a concern to us wherein we dont know any medical terms n condition and hence we visit to a Doctor! Felt very nagative for her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I'm 5th month pregnant,i went to femint immediately because of slight bleeding complaint.Dr.Anitha didn't examine immediately and she was roaming simply. After 20mins she examined me, and told my cervix became short & delivery pains also started.She advised for admission to do cervix stitch in Femiint, so I admitted immediately. She didn't do the cervical stitch procedure & not even one time she didn't examine me until 3:30pm. At 4pm she advised for anomaly scan and asked me to go to manipal hospital,with pains how can I shift to manipal hospital that too yesterday only my scan done in femint itself simply she wasted time. With her improper advice premature delivery happened to me ,  *** ******* **** *** ** ***** ********* * I lost my baby ******* ** *** ********** * **** ** **********

tags: None
review: Dr Anitha Treats the patients so well.i have consulted her in Aug 2015 for my pregnancy checkup, I had a misscarrage before,so I was more concious this time. she used to clear all my doubts ,explained everything clearly , she is available on phone also...right time right medicine....unfortunately i haven't done by delivery there because I went to my home town for delivery...I was worried to do long journey but she told me not to worry n gave me some medicine for safety.i had a good treatment .happy and satisfied

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: M trying for baby since last 3 month & my period was not regular from last 5 month due to weight gain..hence visited Dr anitha * *** ** **** *********** *****i can understand the need of harmon test but she asked me to do so many test like HIV, PCOD, HARMON FUNTION * *** *** ********** ** ******** *** *************** **** *** **** ** *** ******** ***** **** **** *** ******* if you are visiting her two times in two weeks then also she will go for scan.. during this two months she scanned me 4 times**** **** *** ****** * But I spent so much money ************* *** ** ******* ** ****** i visited 4 times already but m still waiting for the medication.In my 1st visit she was so friendly but next visit onward her behavior got changed.. I asked  what could be the reason of my irregular period but she did not responded me back on my queries.it happened during every visit..wastage of time..I will not recommend Dr anitha to anyone...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Anitha is a wonderful doctor who is both friendly & professional. She ensured that all our queries were answered considering we were first time anxious parents. 

She had a positive attitude and had provided great guidance throughout my pregnancy. Her both pre and post delivery care was fantastic. 

She encourages normal delivery. Because of her efforts and encouragement I could have the normal delivery (NVD). 

We would highly recommend her to our friends and family. Thank you Dr. Anitha for all those smiles on our face.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have PCOD n trying to conceive from past 1 year with the help of clomid but could not reach to any conclusion.  & Then I came to know about Dr. Anitha through Internet but the reviews were not that great. Instead of the average reviews, I thought to give it a try as femiint health is very close to my place. So I met her in April 2017 and on the 1st meeting we decided that we must give it a shot. We were very much impressed by the way she understood our problem and came up with immediate solution.  Since April I have been visiting her and getting my treatment done. Please do not go with the reviews on the net for the doctor as she is not only an amazing doctor but also an amazing person. Yes u might have little issues like waiting period is too long at times and the staff is not that efficient compared to other hospitals but when the doctor is so good and well spoken then I guess we ought to ignore the other stuff.

There were series of tests she had performed during the investigation, was able to explain why she did all these tests that are to narrow down the issue. There were situations both myself and my wife were feeling very nervous and worried by thinking of past situations but she filled in confidence for both of us with her words. Our treatment is still on-going, and we are yet to see the results from her treatment. It's too early to judge her treatment but we are pleased with the experience that we had till today. Thank You, Anitha garu *** **** ********* ******** *** ********** I appreciate your special focus and interest on our case.

Many Thanks,

Mahalakshmi Swetha

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I have had a very pleasant experience with Dr.Anitha and her team of other doctors and nurses. Dr.Anitha welcomes her patients with her big pleasant smile every single time, even if it's getting late for her to attend to her kid at home. This proves how much she is dedicated to this profession. She explains and answers all the questions that is posted to her with patience. Best part is she enjoys and feels really happy when there is a positive result and never cease to express it. I would recommend her 200%
Thank you Dr.Anitha!
The clinic atmosphere is really good and clean. Sometimes waiting time is more than expected, but I guess when a doctor is too good you will have to wait for her time.

tags: None
review:
We had a great experience with Dr. Anitha and the entire Femint team that helped us right from the conception to the delivery of our second baby.
She was very helpful and responsive to any queries that we had during consultation and offline.
She helped in having a natural delivery and also was very cooperative to have my husband besides me during the labor.
The staff of Femint was also very helpful and responsive during the entire nine months.
Femint had a very competitive delivery package which was very good.
We would recommend Dr. Anitha and Femint Hospital.

tags: None
review: I went recently for pregnancy check up...as also had spottings same day...the doctor with her painted smile    congratulated me and husband.prescribed few medicines nd advised its common to have such problem. Very next day I had miscarriage ..rushed to her ..she advised dat she will save the pregnancy..****** ******** ** * ******** *********** all I had to do is to undergo painful aborting process which her medicine did not help..later me and my husband went other doctor...for remedy to be done...advice is do not believe dis doc...

tags: None
review:
*** ****** **** ** **** ** *** ******** ** *** ********* ******* * 
The scan findings were done in columbia asia and checking good reviews for Dr Anitha we went to check with her . however her assistant took the entire history and wrote down the scan findings in the prescription and recommended to a surgeon and charged 600rs. 
Its very strange that a doctor of this reputation is not able to give a proper reasoning to the diagnosed problem or the solution and says this is very common . 

I am not going to visit her nor this hospital ever again and recommend you the same . What is the point in wasting time if there is no treatment provided.

tags: None
review:
Dr Anitha is world class doctor. In my experience in India and Norway. I found her very patient. She takes time with the patient. We started with her in month of March 2016 with a complain of heavy menstrual bleeding and weakness. She took a proper diagnostic path checked for the ailment to be uterine fibroid. Also made sure that we build up haemoglobin so that there is no need for transfusions during operation. This goes on to show that doctor gives proper personal attention to patient. DEFINITELY  recommend her. 

She is one of few doctor who clarifies all the question posed to her so you can be sure of what kind of treatment you are undergoing. She is prompt to help the patient by replying prudently any calls/message sent to her. The hospital staff is very friendly. Thanks Dr Anitha

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ***** **** ****** ** ****** Don't really care about patients health. I was operated by Dr Anita for fibroids and she said it's completely removed and there wouldn't be any further growth in that place. * ***** *** **** *** *** ******** However within one is in the same spot the fibroid has grown *** ** *** **** **** ********* ** *** ******** I did an MRI again and sent her the report. *** ***** ** ******** **** She is refusing to talk. Her manager spoke so rudely when I called. **** **** ** ****** **** **** Don't spend your time and money with them. Think twice before you visit this place. ***** *** ****** ******* *** **** **** *********

tags: None
review:
Dr.Anitha was excellent in showing care towards the patients and guiding them when needed. She was available to me and my wife when needed, even if it was very very late in night. My wife felt very much comfortable with the doctor and much of the hospital staff.

My wife delivered the baby in early morning 4'o clock and doctor attended from 2:30 AM!!!
She was there for clearing our queries and anxiety whenever we called or messaged her.

I personally recommend her for all the help and care she had provided. Currently couple of my colleagues have also started consulting her for the maternity advice. They already mention that there is a significant difference (positive) they can notice between Anitha and other Gynecs around Whitefield.

Cost of the labor was also not the usual burden that other hospital charge around Whitefield. All the hospital staff are very friendly and maintained a personal rapport, which made us feel much more comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Being a new mom , I was scared when I was diagnosed with Polyps. Doctor very calmly explained me , there is no particular reason to this. But it can be cured with a minor surgery. But unlike other doctors she didn‚Äôt right away ask me for surgery. She asked me to wait for a month or two , since polyps get washed away in their own with the menstrual flow. I waited for 2-3 months but the problems increased. When I decided for the surgery, my kid was just 2yrs old and I didn‚Äôt wanna stay away from him. Doctor took care of this concern of mine and discharged me in the evening. She is very calm and you can talk to her about every gynaec issue. I am happy to have found her !

tags: None
review: Very kind and sensitive doctor. I went for an Early Pregnancy Scan to Dr. Anitha few days back. Unfortunately we saw no heartbeat and it turned out to be a missed miscarriage. Dr. Anitha was very kind. She soothed me and my husband by explaining gently that it can happen to anyone. Despite the long line of patients outside her door, she didn't rush me.. she let me pause and take my time to process this loss.. I am grateful for her sensitivity, this is very rare in Indian medical scene. For the next pregnancy, I will go to her first!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have been vising doctor Anitha for PCOD problem from which I am suffering from past 1 year. Till now she handled it good, softly spoken and explained the problem so nice. Now she suggested me Ovarian drilling. I will be going through it in next few days. I will keep you posted once the treatment is done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderful doctor !!!! We had a great experience . The ambience of the hospital is awesome and the staffs are very kind.  I was suffering from PCOS around 5yrs before visiting Dr Anitha at Femiint Health , now we are blessed with baby boy . We are so so happy :) :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: very bad experience.. Doctor was very rude.. didn't explain properly about the consequences. i have visited for MTP for this doctor and during my second scan, she didn't even spoke to me.. as i had a developing cyst in my ovary.and also didn't even told me about this.. Seriously am very regretting visiting this doctor.actually i have waited for this doctor appointment for two days..but very disappointed experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr.Anitha is very calm n composed.She understands the problem patiencefully. She explains the treatment procedure and makes one aware of everything what is to be known..staff is also very friendly..only thing is appointment..one has to be wise enough to get appointment because long queue is there and it's really difficult to get as walk-in

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr.anitha,from day one December, we have been consulting you for pregnancy and it's been going good till date .our expecting delivery date is august 10th.your suggestions were very much needed in current corporate condition's. Her friendliness will make us feel safer hand's.
Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I never met a doctor like Dr.Anitha.She is so professional ,patience and friendly.I feel there is a magic in her hands whatever might be the problem she knows how to handle and rectify them.This is my first pregnancy,she educates and clears all my doubts as she available 24x7.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I delivered a baby girl in femmint in nov from the first day I was consulting dr anita mam but at 26 week my water started leak nd I lose all hope but thanks to anita mam under her supervision I delivered at 37 week  she support me throughout my pregnant......She is experienced but one problm that some tym she will not short out query related to pregnany may be she is usal  for this but being patients problm r not new for us but overall my experience with anita mam is super.

tags: None
review: Hello everyone.. I had visited Dr Anitha on November 2015. I was pregnant and in 2.5 months it was lil bleeding. She asked the problem very politely. And checked me. She gave me some medicines. It became completely all right. And now I have a cute baby boy. she has very polite nature. And she is giving you a perfect time. Am recommending you to consult this doctor. Thank you so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Dr Anitha and her staff in Femiint has been a tremendous help during my maternity consultation and delivery. They are a team of competent and caring professionals who know their stuff well. I am overwhelmed by the care received for me and my new born. It has been a smooth and no complaints ride for me!!! Please consult them without any iota of doubt.

Regards 
Tuhina

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted her for my first child and she always put us at ease through the whole journey.  Very friendly and always to the point. Happy to be under her even for my second pregnancy. Her warm smile is very assuring even in the most stressful of times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was too shy to visit the doctor and tell about my problems, because I am obese and any doctor I meet tells me about my weight. But Dr Anitha was so friendly and approachable that I told her all my problems freely and she explained me my issues. yes weight loosing will help, but that is not a permanent solution to my problems. I am extremely satisfied and happy with the consultation. Even the hospital staff is very friendly and helpful. The hospital is well managed and very hygienic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: * **** **** ** *** *** ****** ** *** **** ****** ** ******* ****** ** *** **** ****** **  *********** I met with her recently during my wife‚Äôs 1st  Pregnancy and that time She had some complications. Me and my wife were very panic that time, but she has taken care my wife‚Äôs case  personally. I personally feel  Dr. Anitha  is very soft spoken and also she listens to patients problem with some extra interest she has. During the tenure, most of the times I have asked many questions to her and she answered to me and satisfied us every possible way, We had a good experience with her treatment procedure and now we are blessed with a beautiful angel in our life. I feel happy !! According  to me  Femiint health is definitely a better place than all the others around Whitefield, but little expensive for middle class families like us, but that's ok, because they are very careful to their patients. Definitely recommended.

review:
Femint Health is my second Home.. we have been married for 10 years and we were not having kids.. the very first time when i met Doctor Anitha we requested her to go for IVF.. but she strictly denied unlike other hospitals and Doctors.. we are so happy that she followed step by step Treatment **** ****** ********** and Now we are blessed with Baby Boy .. ...
